# Advance Procurement Notice: Energy Performance Contracting Program

## Tender Details

* **Title**: Energy Performance Contracting Program
* **Reference Number**: MX-42838264655
* **Solicitation Number**: EPC2023
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-17T14:00:00

## Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) has launched an Advance Procurement Notice for an Energy Performance Contracting Program to reduce energy consumption, mitigate greenhouse gas emissions, and explore alternative energy supply opportunities. The program aims to meet the Government of Canada's energy conservation and efficiency targets.

## Services Required

The successful contractor will be responsible for delivering feasibility studies, financing, performance and savings guarantees, concepts and design, commissioning, training, construction, and project management services.

## Security Requirements

To be eligible for contract award, contractors must actively hold a valid and active Designated Organization Screening (DOS) granted by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC). Defence Construction Canada (DCC) offers a sponsorship process through its Industrial Security Program (ISP) to assist contractors in obtaining the required security clearance.

## Tender Process

Contractors are encouraged to express their interest and begin the security clearance application process by applying through DCC's ISP. A sponsorship request application must be submitted to DCC, including the contract number EPC2023 and the level of clearance requested.

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Camille Attia
* **Email**: camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 613-990-4342
* **Address**: Defence Construction Canada, 350 Albert St, 19th floor, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K3

## Notice URL

You can access the tender documents and submit an offer on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
